```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

#### Read song_lyrics_sample file
```{r}
song_lyrics <- read.csv("song_lyrics.csv")
glimpse(song_lyrics)

clean_song_lyrics <- song_lyrics %>%
  mutate(decade=ifelse(between(year, 1970, 1979), "1970s", ifelse(between(year, 1980, 1989),"1980s",ifelse(between(year, 1990, 1999),"1990s",ifelse(between(year,2000 , 2010),"2000s",ifelse(between(year,2010 , 2019),"2010s",ifelse(between(year,2020 , 2029),"2020s","")))))))

glimpse(clean_song_lyrics)
```
